results.content: As a person new to SEO this course was excellent. After completing the course, I feel like I have learned a great amount of information which will be helpful in getting my and my clients the best possible outcome when it comes to website optimization. I have taken several other courses offered by Alex and I always find his courses very valuable. Thanks for making this course Alex, great job explaining everything.

results.content: This course was fantastic! I learned so much information that will help me with my affiliate website. Alex is a very good teacher and his courses are always filled with the most relevant information.

results.content:
This is all a bit new for me.  I find I usually have to listen to these several times which is fine.  But it’s a little overwhelming right now.

I am learning so much.  I had so many questions about the items on the page and posts i've already written and one by one, this is covering them all - and then some.  So far, I am able t follow pretty well.

Just finished the course and even though I took lots of notes, I am definitely going to go back to a few sections to watch again (at least one more time).  The course was super helpful to explain to someone who knew next to nothing going in (although it is clearly not just for beginners).  The outline on the side is also terrific at making sure I can hit the spots I need and not waste time looking through content.  Thank you!  I feel so much better after completing this training.
results.content_html:

results.content: I felt that some concepts were explained a bit too briefly for a novice like me but overall a great course with a very lively instructor :) One thing that I enjoyed is the fact that Alex is giving very honest and unbiased reviews about the plugins and tools he's using and only for that, this course would be worth it as it saves a lot of research time.
